byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: Kodak has struck a deal to license several of its patents to Imax, helping to raise money as it tries to turn around its business. But the film pioneer faces a patent lawsuit from Fujifilm as well.
snippet: Kodak has struck a deal to license several of its patents to Imax, helping to raise money as it tries to turn around its business. But the film pioneer faces a patent lawsuit from Fujifilm as well.

headline.main: Kodak Strikes Patent Licensing Deal With Imax
